## Apple Stock Data
```{r}
suppressMessages(library(plotly))
aapl <- read.csv("AAPL.csv", header = TRUE, colClasses = c("character", rep("numeric", 6)))
aapl <- aapl[, c(1, 5)]
aapl[, 1] <- as.Date(aapl[, 1])
names(aapl) <- tolower(names(aapl))
```

```{r, cache = TRUE}
p <- plot_ly(aapl, x = ~date, y = ~close, type = "scatter", mode = "lines+markers") %>%
    layout(title = "Apple (AAPL) Closing Stock Price Over a One Year Period", 
           yaxis = list(title = "USD ($)"), 
           xaxis = list(title = "Date"))
p
```
